name: Alitis
overview:
Join stock company ALITIS was founded in 2004. Company successfully composes and supplies the materials for engineering systems to European Union, countries of Eastern Europe and Russian Federation. Our principal directions of activities are air conditioning, ventilation, heating and refrigerating systems for all types of applications.

Sales figures of ALITIS Ltd. are rising rapidly and over the past year they have consistently been able to expand sales.

They offer only certified equipment of leading manufactures from Western Europe, widening offered product range continually. They provide customers with a wide range of modern and high quality products of heating, ventilation and air conditioning that allows to satisfy all customer needs completely.

Company ALITIS offers:

basic technical solutions, engineering consultation, equipment selection, organization of logistical services, informational and technical support. Most products are supplied directly from the manufacturers that guarantee the best delivery terms and affordable prices. All the products are certified by ISO 9001, Eurovent and GOST.

Company Alitis aim is to be flexible and reliable partner, developing long standing relationships with customers in order to maintain our excellent levels of service.
